document_title: Warts on the feet (soles): Causes, signs, prevention
subsection_content:
Have. Warts are not too contagious, but when exposed directly to the skin, the risk of infection is unavoidable. Warts can also be transmitted indirectly from contaminated objects or surfaces, such as areas around swimming pools, towels or even floors that are vectors for the virus.
When the skin is wet or damaged, the likelihood of infection is higher and it can take several weeks to months from the time of infection for warts to appear.
subsection_title: mun coc o chan.json. Are foot warts contagious?
subsection_data:
mun coc o chan.json. Are foot warts contagious?
Have. Warts are not too contagious, but when exposed directly to the skin, the risk of infection is unavoidable. Warts can also be transmitted indirectly from contaminated objects or surfaces, such as areas around swimming pools, towels or even floors that are vectors for the virus.
When the skin is wet or damaged, the likelihood of infection is higher and it can take several weeks to months from the time of infection for warts to appear.
